comments:
Doing a Update and Override with conflicting additions (incoming and
outgoing addition resulted in the following ArrayStoreException,
and deleted the local copy.  On a subsequent sync, the resources
showed up as incoming additions.

This occurred to me for each of 3 different sets conflicting additions.
